com.wounit.annotations

Annotation Type UnderTest


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
 @Documented
public @interface UnderTest
    This annotation allows shorthand creation of enterprise objects, minimizing repetitive creation code. It must be used in companion of the MockEditingContext class or the TemporaryEditingContext class. 
     public class FooTest {
     @UnderTest
     private Foo foo;
 
     @Rule
     public MockEditingContext ec = new MockEditingContext("SampleModel");
 
     @Test
     public void fooIsInitializedWhenInserted() {
        assertThat(foo.value(), is(0));
     }
 }
    The @UnderTest annotation works with both rules: MockEditingContext and TemporaryEditingContext.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Henrique Prange

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int size 

    • Element Detail

      • size

        public abstract int size
        Default:
        1
